title: You are invited, to be a part of our celebration.

text: He slipped the engagement ring on her finger's & promise made for life . . .
Join us as we share their joy, now that they're man and wife!...
The Parents of Jerin Scariah Abraham (Groom) and Sherin Mary Varghese (Bride) invite you to join them in honoring for post marriage Reception.
Prepare for a Feast of Jubilation! The honour of your presence is requested at the Reception.

section.title: Trains from Kerala
section.text: Confused about which train comes where? Here is the list of some trains from Kerala to Bangalore. Hope this helps.

section.title: Buses from Kerala
section.text: There are quiet a number of buses that come to bangalore on daily bases. This link helps to book buses from Kerala to Bangalore.

section.title: Stay/Hotels near by
section.text: There are some good stays available near to our location, you can choose from the link below.

section.title: Cabs needed to travel locally
section.text: Some contacts of the cabs in bangalore will defenitely be handy. The below link helps you to get the contact of the bangalore cab service 24 X 7.
